# HKMetadataKeyHeartRateSensorLocation

**Global Variable**

The location where a specific heart rate reading was taken.

## Declaration

```swift
let HKMetadataKeyHeartRateSensorLocation: String
```

## Discussion

This key takes an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] containing an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKHeartRateSensorLocation] as its value.

## Valid Locations

- **HKHeartRateSensorLocation**: Constants that indicate where on the body the heart rate sensor is located.

## Metadata Keys

- **HKMetadataKeyHeartRateMotionContext**: The user’s activity level when the heart rate sample was measured.
